markdownRemark.html: The school is a co-educational day school and offers The English National Curriculum in an international context. Students sit IGCSE and GCSE examinations in Year 11 and those who qualify to enter the Sixth Form study for AS levels and A2 (A) level examinations in preparation for university entrance at 18..0 .

frontmatter.title: The English International College
frontmatter.description: The English International College - The school is a co-educational day school and offers The English National Curriculum in an international context. Students sit IGCSE and GCSE examinations in Year 11 and those who qualify to enter the Sixth Form study for AS levels and A2 (A) level examinations in preparation for university entrance at 18.
